Others: Fans troll Sanju Samson for poor batting performance on Sunday.
Indian batter Sanju Samson scored only seven runs before disappointingly throwing away his wicket.
Team India batted first in the second T20I after winning the toss.
Sanju Samson walked in at the No. 5 position and began positively with a beautiful boundary playing a cut short on the offside.
He completely missed the ball, and the wicketkeeper collected it cleanly to finish an easy stumping.
